channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Boom in Zero-Day Options Is Coming for Tesla and Nvidia
item.description: Brokers and exchanges discuss expanding #0dte to options on individual stocks.

item.title: Here’s why airline stocks merit another look, analyst says
item.description: Demand is starting to pick up and exceed capacity, brightening fall prospects for U.S. airlines.

item.title: China Harnesses a Technology That Vexed the West, Unlocking a Treasure Chest
item.description: Chinese companies are dominating a crucial industry by accessing a new source of minerals needed for electric-vehicle batteries.

item.title: S&P 500 just saw its worst first week of September since 1953, this chart shows
item.description: The S&P 500 index just had a particularly ugly start to September in a historically rough month for the U.S. stock market, according to Bespoke Invest...

item.title: A Guide to Why You Should Buy Bonds (And Why You Shouldn't)
item.description: Bonds have regained the haven property that made them desirable for 60/40 portfolios. But that may not matter as much as usually believed.

item.title: How to pursue high income with relative safety while diversifying your portfolio
item.description: These high-yield bond funds have high ratings for long-term returns.

item.title: September Is Once Again a Tough Month for Stocks
item.description: The S&P 500 fell 4.2% last week on concerns about the health of the U.S. economy. Going back to 1928, September has been stocks’ weakest month of the ...

item.title: Boeing’s stock bounces as averted strike and return of Starliner remove headwinds
item.description: Boeing’s stock was headed for a nice bounce Monday, as the tentative agreement reached with the International Association of Machinists District 751 r...

item.title: Crypto Plan Creates Potential Conflicts for Trump
item.description: The former president’s digital-currency efforts bring his campaign closer to an industry that is spending to limit regulations.

item.title: Terns Pharmaceuticals’ stock soars 26% after biotech posts positive results in trial of weight-loss drug in pill form
item.description: Terns plans to move to a Phase 2 trial for its TERN-601 small-molecule GLP-1 receptor agonist and will submit the latest data to a coming scientific c...
